1: -module(hty_seqfile_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -export([
    4:   all/0,
    5:   init_per_suite/1,
    6:   end_per_suite/1,
    7:   init_test/1,
    8:   incr_test/1,
    9:   badfile_test/1
   10: ]).
   11: 
   12: all() -> [
   13:   init_test,
   14:   incr_test,
   15:   badfile_test
   16: ].
   17: 
   18: init_per_suite(Cfg) -> filelib:ensure_dir(priv_dir(Cfg)), Cfg.
   19: end_per_suite(Cfg) -> Cfg.
   20: 
   21: priv_dir(Cfg) -> proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Cfg) ++ "hty_seqfile/".
   22: 
   23: init_test(Cfg) ->
   24:   {ok, "1"} = hty_seqfile:incr(priv_dir(Cfg) ++ "newfile.txt").
   25: 
   26: incr_test(Cfg) ->
   27:   {ok, N} = hty_seqfile:incr(priv_dir(Cfg) ++ "newerfile.txt"),
   28:   {N1, _} = string:to_integer(N),
   29:   N2 = integer_to_list(N1 + 1),
   30:   {ok, N2} = hty_seqfile:incr(priv_dir(Cfg) ++ "newerfile.txt").
   31: 
   32: badfile_test(Cfg) ->
   33:     File = priv_dir(Cfg) ++ "badfolder/badfile.txt",
   34:     {err, File, enoent} = hty_seqfile:incr(File).
